work.name: Synchrony Financial
work.summary: Worked on building the replacement for Synchrony's main credit forecasting engines.
highlights: Engineered a PySpark input file validation pipeline for Synchrony’s new credit risk forecasting engine to prevent failed runs.
Reduced overall prediction error by 7% by employing Tableau to analyze backtesting data and fine-tune model parameters.
Led an intern team of 4 to develop a regression model exploring the error propagation of variables in our credit risk formulas.
Won 1st place in the Synchrony Summer 2022 Hackathon with 200+ participants.

work.name: Panasonic North America
work.summary: ML-based predictive maintenance and error notification dashboard for Pick-and-Place machines in PCB assembly lines.
highlights: Developed a real-time error chart handling large amounts of data, 28 nested filters, and multiple languages and timezones.
Led the charge in refactoring to enforce ISO timestamps  across databases and unified JSON responses from our backend.
Spearheaded a team of 5 in developing a computer-networking resource sharing and discussion web application.
Engineered a comment section with upvoting using tree-construction and efficient Stale-While-Revalidate fetching pattern.
Designed a JWT authentication system with email validation, password hashing, and user authorization levels.
Modeled 200+ protein sequences using AlphaFold 2 protein folding deep learning model.
Constructed multiple bioinformatics pipelines for genome assembly and RNA sequencing analysis.
